description: A group of employees at Hachette Book Group have penned a letter to management condemning the announced launch of a new conservative imprint, Basic Liberty, and hiring of Thomas Spence, former president and publisher of Regnery, to helm it.
title: Hachette employees protest new conservative imprint

description:
Percival Everett and Samantha Harvey are the bookies' favourites to win the 2024 Booker prize.

American author Everett was Ladbrokes' frontrunner before the company closed bets on Monday morning, with 2/1 odds of taking home the £50,000 award for his novel James – a reimagining of Mark Twain's Adventures of Huckleberry Finn from the perspective of the enslaved Jim.
title: Percival Everett and Samantha Harvey favourites to win 2024 Booker prize
